resources.string: Please grant read and write permissions for external storage.
To grant storage access, please firstly select root path of internal storage.
To grant storage access, please firstly select root path of SD card.
Now you can select any folders under %s
Storage access has been granted for %s
You have no write access to this storage, thus selecting this folder is useless. \nWould you like to grant access to this folder?
